question: <image 1> This work can be attributed to which of the following periods in art history?
description: The image depicts a statue of a muscular male figure standing with one arm raised and the other holding a draped cloth. The figure is nude except for the cloth and wears sandals. The statue has a realistic and detailed representation of the human body, showcasing well-defined muscles and anatomical features. The style of the statue, including the pose and the detailed rendering of the anatomy, suggests it is from the Imperial Roman period.
